string-array.name: lead_description_zh
string-array.item: 每日编辑精选，一如既往
离线自动缓存，精彩永不下线
登录即可订阅、评论和同步已收藏视频

string-array.name: lead_description_en
string-array.item: Daily appetizers for your eyes, as always
Subscribe more, discover a whale lot more
Enjoy your daily eyepetit, even without connectivity
Sign in to comment collect video, to subscript also
